subject: Boxing
Medicine and Health
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: At least eight states have let fighters enter the ring with fraudulent or insufficient medical examinations in recent years, a pattern of neglect nurtured by a patchwork system of safety.
snippet: At least eight states have let fighters enter the ring with fraudulent or insufficient medical examinations in recent years, a pattern of neglect nurtured by a patchwork system of safety.
